item.title: How to detect WebGL support
item.description: Detect if browser supports WebGL. function webglDetect() { var canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); var contextNames = ['webgl','experimental-webgl','moz-webgl','webkit-3d']; var context; if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE') > -1) { try { context = WebGLHelper.CreateGLContext(canvas, 'canvas'); } catch(e) {} } else { for (var i = 0; i < contextNames.length; i++) { try { context = canvas.getContext(contextNames[i]); if (context) { break; } } catch(e) {} } } return !!context; } Usage: if (webglDetect()) { // WebGL is supported } On github at miguelmota/webgl-detect.
